name: Too STEM for you
description:
The objective of this Final Degree Project is the creation of a serious video game as a tool to help to the awareness and recruitment of female population in the careers defined as STEM.
This project proposes a serious video game with a narrative through the characters and levels from which we can show the player stories from real women that belong to this kind of careers, as well as to the fields in which they were outstanding. This narrative is complimented with the use of STEM content related mechanics which we can find in this kind of careers, as programming, genetics or maths, furthermore adding classic video game elements as a simple combat system.
Our objective will be to empower the player, raise awareness that STEM careers do not know about genders and demystify related aspects.
